alert.note: Alert for Greensville; Southampton; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 6:02PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Greensville, central Southampton and southeastern Sussex Counties and the City of Emporia through 645 PM EDT... At 601 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Green Plain, or near Emporia, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Homeville around 640 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Adams Grove, Gray, Grizzard, Yale, Lumberton, Littleton, Hilda, Mason, Sebrell and Drewryville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
